txt.en: 'We will defend our home from Saruman's pet clans. Why must we leave?'
'We can defend this valley from anything Saruman sends at us. Why would we leave it?'
'I have no desire to march to war. I say we stay here, at our home.'
'The other clans have sided with Saruman? What is that to me?'
'The clans that side with Saruman will not trouble the Falcon. Let them do as they will.'
'If Lheu Brenin says we must fight the other clans, we will. But I see no reason for it.'
